net.sf.javaml.distance

Class CosineDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.javaml.distance.AbstractDistance
      • net.sf.javaml.distance.CosineDistance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DistanceMeasure

    public class CosineDistance
extends AbstractDistance
    This similarity based distance measure actually measures the angle between two vectors. The value returned lies in the interval [0,1].
    Author:
    Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
